programme.title: Don't Name it, Cure it
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke examines what President Bush is doing about fraudulent financial deals.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke considers his shifting habits and examines what President George W Bush is doing about fraudulent financial deals by corporations and, allegedly, Bush himself.
